artifacts.label: Soup Protocol Documentation
artifacts.blurb: The Soup docs are styled like a digital whitepaper. A good introduction sets the stage, emphasizes benefits, and uses diagrams to establish the scope and introduce the cast of characters.

artifacts.label: FOMO App - Live Market
artifacts.blurb: A mobile prediction market interface showing live betting on Eagles vs. Chiefs. Displays real-time odds, volume, and cash-out options.

artifacts.label: Single Market View
artifacts.blurb: Prediction markets are a natural fit for social apps like Base. This is the screen to have open when you’re watching the Super Bowl.

artifacts.label: Receipt Detail
artifacts.blurb: The receipt is the most screen-shotted and shared element of prediction markets. Here, the background gradient is derived from the position and originating client, in this case Eagles (teal) and Coinbase (blue).

artifacts.label: Clearing Co. Price Tag
artifacts.blurb:
Bodega price tags are a fit for niche, long-tail markets on topics that have never been priced before.

In prediction markets where price equals probability, 99¢ is the price of a sure bet.

artifacts.label: Battleship Grid
artifacts.blurb: Putting the building blocks of prediction markets onchain unlocks novel possibilities. Here, one side of a game of Battleship is played by the crowd, betting on the likelihood of a hit in any square on the grid. Hit/miss is revealed periodically on the square with the highest volume.
